data.title: William "The Lion" King of (William "The Lion" King of) Scotland [Wikibio] sss (1143
data.meta_description: William "The Lion" King of Scotland was born in the year 1143 in Huntingdon, Huntingdonshire, England, son of Henry Earl of Huntingdon and Ada de Warenne. He was married no marriage to Miss de Hythus, they gave birth to 1 child. He was married about 1160 in No marriage to Isabel of Avenal, they had 2 children. He was married on September  5, 1189 in Woodstock, Oxfordshire, England to Ermengarde of Beaumont, they had 2 children. He died on December  4, 1214 in Stirling Castle, Stirlingshire, England. This information is part of Genealogy Wylie by Kin Mapper on Genealogy Online.
